page.title: 11An Eversley Boy
page.content: My name is{David Squires}and I am nine years old. I live in a bungalow. I wake up at 7.00 when my mum brings me a cup of tea in bed. I have a wash in our bathroom then I have my cereal. At 7.30 I get dressed and then my sister, mum and I walk our labrador dog. My sister,{Lisa,}catches the coach to Yateley School at 8.20 and I walk with her to my school at the same time. On Thursdays my mum comes in to help my teacher. We are printing pictures such as the church and the egg farm to make a tapestry which we will embroider. We have lunch at noon. I have a packed lunch, which might be two rolls, cake and a biscuit. School ends at 3.30. Tea is at about 6.00, but I might have a swim in our pool first. After watching television I brush my teeth before going to bed at 9.00.
